properties.entry: INSERT INTO sc_warehouse_unit ( ID, TYPE, CODE, MEMO, WAREHOUSE_ID ) VALUES ('{@#id#}', '{@#type#}', '{@#code#}', '{@#memo#}', '{@#warehouseId#}' )

UPDATE sc_warehouse_unit SET TYPE = '{@#type#}' , CODE = '{@#code#}' , MEMO = '{@#memo#}' , WAREHOUSE_ID = '{@#warehouseId#}'
WHERE ID = '{@#id#}'
